scripts.build: npm run tsc || true && npm run roll && npm run minify
scripts.roll:w: concurrent 'rollup -m -w -o js/common.roll.js js/common.js' 'rollup -m -w -o js/sign-in.roll.js js/sign-in.js' 'rollup -m -w -o js/item.roll.js js/item.js' 'rollup -m -w -o js/list.roll.js js/list.js' 'rollup -m -w -o js/add-item.roll.js js/add-item.js' 'rollup -m -w -o js/admin-list.roll.js js/admin-list.js'
scripts.roll: rollup -m -o js/common.roll.js js/common.js && rollup -m -o js/sign-in.roll.js js/sign-in.js && rollup -m -o js/item.roll.js js/item.js && rollup -m -o js/list.roll.js js/list.js && rollup -m -o js/add-item.roll.js js/add-item.js && rollup -m -o js/admin-list.roll.js js/admin-list.js
scripts.minify: uglifyjs -m -o js/common.roll.min.js js/common.roll.js && uglifyjs -m -o js/sign-in.roll.min.js js/sign-in.roll.js && uglifyjs -m -o js/item.roll.min.js js/item.roll.js && uglifyjs -m -o js/list.roll.min.js js/list.roll.js && uglifyjs -m -o js/add-item.roll.min.js js/add-item.roll.js && uglifyjs -m -o js/admin-list.roll.min.js js/admin-list.roll.js
